quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
author: Harold Abelson

quote: Truth can only be found in one place: the code.
author: Robert C. Martin

quote: Give a man a program, frustrate him for a day. Teach a man to program, frustrate him for a lifetime.
author: Muhammad Waseem

quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming, is not worth knowing.
author: Alan J. Perlis

quote: Write the code that is needed, not just the code you know.
author: Max Kanat-Alexander

quote: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, itâ€™s bad.
author: Cory House

quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
author: Ralph Johnson

quote: Good code is its own best documentation.
author: Steve McConnell

quote: Better to have 100 functions operate on one data structure than 10 functions on 10 data structures.
author: Alan Perlis
